short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn any piece of writing into a tweet. Use machine learning to turn long text into one short sentence

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remark is a text summarization app that can convert long blog post into short remark and meanwhile keeps the meaning of the message. You can significantly reduce time on reading long articles, by fetching the main points using powerful NLP techniques and algorithms
